ygData.subject: Battle of the Ark's Structural Integrity
ygData.msgSnippet: (RebelYell, Minime, and Logomorph you have to wait for me to reply. Just because I don t reply with in the minute, doesn t mean no one is going to.  You have

Subject: Battle of the Ark's Structural Integrity

From: "Lord Unitron" <KSLawdogg@...>

(RebelYell, Minime, and Logomorph you have to wait for me to reply.  
Just because I don't reply with in the minute, doesn't mean no one is 
going to.  You have to be patient.  And Logomorph, please, don't do 
like five posts of you talking with Spears, and then have her 
attack.  That's five seperate attacks when I haven't even responded)


The Oblitercons/Zergling/Punch/Oinker/Serpentor/Unitron/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot/BH/Blastrage:





Serpentor headed into the Ark, laughing.

---

Pyro cursed, shots knocking him back a few feet.

---

Breakdown ducked under one dagger, another stabbing into his left 
forearm.  Raising his greande launcher with his right arm, he fired 
off a grenade set to explode on impact at Bluestreak's abdomen.

---

Scavenger side stepped, a blast digging into his arm.  

---

Hiss fired off a rocket at Torca.

---

Dark One and Unitron flew in tight formation, each firing off a 
missile at the Ark, two missiles heading for the hull of the Ark.

---

Oinker screamed, sidestepping the chainsaw, but 16 bullets from 
RebelYell sent him sprawling backwards, catching all of them in his 
gut.

-----

Zergling and Punch jumped to the side, crashing to the ground on 
their chest, not able to return fire at the moment.  Zergling broke 
into stupid laughter as a rocket, a few photon charges, and several 
spears headed for undamaged machinery that was behind them.

---

Serpentor entered the engine room, firing off a blast from his plasma 
launcher a few feet behind the three Maximals, trying to knock them 
down.

---

BH brought the skimmer about, Blastrage firing off three grenades at 
the Ark via the large grenade launcher.

===

Nemesis Enforcer watched the radar.  He made a coughing noise, 
Scattershot at his side in moments.  "Yes, Emperor Enforcer?"

"Send a comm. transmission to our soldiers.  Tell them to fall back 
to (blah blah coordinates, I don't know how to specify since we have 
no real chart etc) and wait for further orders."

"But, Emperor, Predacon reinforcements are coming!"

"They waited to long.  Issue the orders.  I COMMAND IT!"

"Yes, Emperor." Scattershot got busy sending the message out.
